item.title: Report X-2024101521
item.description:
Report X-2024101521

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-25T09:22:20+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-11
  • City: RONKONKOMA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 10/11/2024 at approximately 1730, Dangerous Goods Administration received a call from Employee 966383 and the station location in Ronkonkoma, reporting a dangerous goods spill. The shipment is a large cylinder. The shipment was reported to have fallen from the sort belt and began to make a "hissing" sound, indicating that the cylinder was releasing pressure. After evaluation, the shipment was isolated from people and other freight until completely depressurized. The shipment is being for customer pick-up.
